001package gbw.melange.common;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.jpms.SPILocator;
004import gbw.melange.common.mesh.services.IMeshPipelineConfig;
005import gbw.melange.common.shading.services.IShadingPipelineConfig;
006import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
007import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
008import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
009import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
010
011import java.util.HashSet;
012import java.util.Set;
013//This is manually registered, meaning if an instance is defined and provided on MelangeApplication.run()
014//that instance is preserved and distributed as if the result of the standard BeanProvider<IMelangeConfig>
015@Configuration
016public class MelangeConfig implements IMelangeConfig {
017    private static final Logger log = LogManager.getLogger();
018    private boolean cachingEnabled = true;
019    private Set<LogLevel> logLevel = new HashSet<>(Set.of(LogLevel.VIEW_INFO, LogLevel.HOOKS, LogLevel.IMPROPER_API_USAGE, LogLevel.PIPELINE_ISSUES));
020    private boolean glDebugEnabled = false;
021    private boolean clearGeneratedOnExit = false;
022    private boolean clearGeneratedOnStart = true;
023    private IShadingPipelineConfig shadingConfig = SPILocator.getBean(IShadingPipelineConfig.class);
024    private IMeshPipelineConfig meshConfig = SPILocator.getBean(IMeshPipelineConfig.class);
025
026    @Override
027    public String toString(){
028        return "MelangeConfig {cachingEnabled: " + cachingEnabled + ", logLevel: " + logLevel + ", clearGenOnExit: " + clearGeneratedOnExit + ", clearGenOnStart: " + clearGeneratedOnStart + ", shadingConfig: " + shadingConfig + ", meshConfig: " + meshConfig + "}";
029    }
030
031    public void resolve(){
032
033        if(!logLevel.contains(LogLevel.PIPELINE_STATUS)){
034            log.trace("resolve | Removing pipeline info");
035            shadingConfig.setLoggingAspects(new HashSet<>());
036
037        }
038
039        log.debug(this);
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public IMelangeConfig useCaching(boolean yesNo){
044       this.cachingEnabled = yesNo;
045       shadingConfig.useCaching(yesNo);
046       return this;
047    }
048    @Override
049    public boolean getUseCaching(){
050        return cachingEnabled;
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public IMelangeConfig setLoggingAspects(Set<LogLevel> values){
055        this.logLevel = values;
056        return this;
057    }
058    @Override
059    public Set<LogLevel> getLoggingAspects(){
060        return logLevel;
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public IMelangeConfig setShadingConfig(IShadingPipelineConfig shadingConfig) {
065        if (shadingConfig == null) return this;
066
067        this.shadingConfig = shadingConfig;
068        return this;
069    }
070
071
072    @Override
073    public IMelangeConfig setMeshConfig(IMeshPipelineConfig meshConfig) {
074        if (meshConfig == null) return this;
075
076        this.meshConfig = meshConfig;
077        return this;
078    }
079
080
081    @Override
082    public IMelangeConfig clearGeneratedContentOnExit(boolean yesNo){
083        this.clearGeneratedOnExit = yesNo;
084        shadingConfig.clearGeneratedContentOnExit(yesNo);
085        return this;
086    }
087    @Override
088    public boolean getClearGeneratedOnExit(){
089        return clearGeneratedOnExit;
090    }
091
092    @Override
093    public IMelangeConfig clearGeneratedOnStart(boolean yesNo){
094        this.clearGeneratedOnStart = yesNo;
095        shadingConfig.clearGeneratedOnStart(yesNo);
096        return this;
097    }
098    @Override
099    public boolean getClearGeneratedOnStart(){
100        return clearGeneratedOnStart;
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public IMelangeConfig enableGLDebug(boolean yesNo){
105        this.glDebugEnabled = yesNo; //Doesn't work rn
106        return this;
107    }
108    @Override
109    public boolean getEnableGLDebug(){
110        return glDebugEnabled;
111    }
112
113    @Bean
114    @Override
115    public IShadingPipelineConfig getShadingConfig() {
116        return shadingConfig;
117    }
118
119    @Bean
120    @Override
121    public IMeshPipelineConfig getMeshConfig() {
122        return meshConfig;
123    }
124
125}
